attributes.action: Start the full rate NMW from age 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Usdaw has launched a campaign to have the adult rate of the National Minimum Wage (NMW) paid at 18 after its own survey uncovered alarming evidence of the plight of young workers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
